mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market.user (name, id, password, birthday, email) VALUES (#{name}, #{id}, #{password} , #{birthday}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT name,id FROM market.user WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password} LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM market.user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM market.user WHERE id = #{id} AND email = #{email}
SELECT workname, place, map , distance, personnal, workingin, workingout FROM market.gada WHERE home_id = #{homeId} -- home_id를 파라미터로 사용
SELECT u.name, u.phone, u.birthday, mp.certification FROM market.user u LEFT JOIN market.mypage mp ON u.id = mp.user_id WHERE u.name = #{name}
